name: d8n-nexus
description: D8N + Nexus Ecosystem with NIP-1 SDK

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix sdk/nip1-sdk && npm run build --prefix sdk/nip1-sdk && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix engine && npm install --prefix mock-provider
scripts.start: npx concurrently -n backend,frontend,engine,mock -c blue,green,yellow,magenta "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:engine" "npm run dev:mock"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:sdk && npm run test:integration
